FAQ / Wave 5 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Energon Mace

  1. If the upgraded character is attacking an Autobot Leader, does it also get +1 attack from the first ability? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. Both abilities apply and the upgraded character gets +1 attack and Pierce 3.
  2. If one of my characters has a Weapon or Utility in its Armor slot (e.g. Energon Mace), can I play Ghost Shield to upgrade that character? [Source: WotC]
    No. In order to play Ghost Shield, it must replace an Armor in that slot.
  3. CUSTOM CARD
    Can I put this on Decepticons?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Yes, just because it is an Autobot card doesn’t mean that restricts who you can play it on. Take Energon Mace as an inverse example.
  4. CUSTOM CARD
    Optimus Prime - Dark Awakening     [Source: BFA World|Strike]
    In bot mode, Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening gains the benefits of his faction Upgrade ability as long as the faction Upgrades on him aren’t Autobot or Quintesson.
    As of this (FAQ's) writing, these are all the faction Upgrades that Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening can utilize to buff your team.
    Autobot:

    • Any Autobot Upgrade, though Noble’s Blaster also has a [G] pip


    Decepticon:

    • Electro-Optical Visor

    • Energon Mace

    • Fusion Cannon of Megatron

    • Hazardous Shield

    • Null-Ray of Starscream


    Mercenary:

    • Black Mail (Wave BFA)

    • Dutch (Wave BFA)

    • Subcontractor Agreement (Wave BFA)

    • Valuable Contract


    Quintesson:

    • Any valid Quintesson Upgrade
